channel.title: This Week In React - Newsletter
channel.description: Weekly issues of the This Week In React curation newsletter

item.title: 【This Week In React #241: Remix, Next.js, Turbopack, Radix DOM templating, Ultracite, Stack, StyleX, MUI | Nitro Week, Skia, App Generator, Swift, Kotlin | ES2025, Rspack, Babel, TypeScript, Effect, Deno, Three.js】本周在React＃241中：Remix，Next.js，Turbopack，Radix Dom Templating，Ultracite，stack，Stylex，Mui | Nitro Week，Skia，App Generator，Swift，Kotlin | ES2025，rspack，babel，打字稿，效果，deNo，三人
